participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Creative and introverted, she finds solace in nature and is cautious about social situations.
participant_1.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, he loves connecting with others and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: my parents were also teachers. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i love to play board games. i am an elementary school teacher. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.
